name: Eater of Millions
text:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set.
Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 5 or more cards from your hand, field, and/or Extra Deck, face-down.
This card gains 100 ATK/DEF for each face-down banished card.
This card cannot be Tributed, nor used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Summon.
Once per turn, at the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that opponent's monster, face-down.
